title: Ballpark Postcards for Sale - 1 card remaining - Price reduced 2/14
author: Greenmonster

posts.post_title: Ballpark Postcards for Sale - 1 card remaining - Price reduced 2/14
posts.post_content:
The following are available for sale, price includes Priority Mail shipping and insurance.  Payment by PayPal Friends and Family.  Contact me (PM or email) regarding item availability prior to sending payment.  My email address for contact and PayPal is [url]JSRNA@AOL.COM[/url].  Contact with any questions.  Thank you.  Jim


- New York Polo Grounds, commercially printed postcard, uncatalogued, only known copy, postmarked 1909, interesting note on back.  SOLD


- Lane Field, San Diego PCL ballpark, 1948 commercially printed B&W postcard, uncommon, SOLD



- Crosley Field, Real Photo Postcard C1930, Eppa Rixey pitching, card measures 3 1/8 X 5 7/16, SOLD



- Forbes Field, real photo adverting card for Willets & Felix, 1909 opening day view of the new ballpark vs Cubs, $475.00

- Shibe Park, commercially printed postcard, uncommon, produced by Taylor, 1910. SOLD
